  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void activateProductions()
    checks every available production, creating a collective map of all inputs and outputs of selected productions, then if the resources in the map input are available, passes the map output to the strongbox to be added, and passes the map input to the board to be removed
    protected void addDiscount​(ResourceType resourceType)
    Modifies the map discounts: if the resource type is already present, increments its value by 1 if the resource type is not present, it gets added to the map with value 1
    protected void addExtraProduction​(Production production)
    adds the new production to the extra productions list
    protected void addWhiteTo​(ResourceType resourceType)
    Modifies the map for the white marble conversion: if the resource type is already present, increments its value by 1 if the resource type is not present, it gets added to the map with value 1
    protected void buyCard​(DevelopmentCard d, java.lang.Integer slot)
    buy the selected development card and push it on the board
    protected java.lang.Integer checkDiscount​(ResourceType res)
    method that tells the discount of a certain resource

    • playLeader

      protected void playLeader​(LeaderCard leaderCard) throws CardNotAvailableException, RequirementNotMetException, IllegalResourceException
      if the card passed as parameter is available and its requirements are met, all its abilities get activated, then the card is removed from the leadersInHand list and added to the leadersInGame list
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - card that is activated
      Throws:
      CardNotAvailableException - thrown if leaderCard is not in the leadersInHand list
      RequirementNotMetException
      IllegalResourceException

      Throws:
      CardNotAvailableException - if the leader card is not available

    • activateProductions

      protected void activateProductions() throws ResourcesNotAvailableException, IllegalResourceException, TooManyResourcesException, UnknownFoundException, IllegalActionException
      checks every available production, creating a collective map of all inputs and outputs of selected productions, then if the resources in the map input are available, passes the map output to the strongbox to be added, and passes the map input to the board to be removed
      Throws:
      ResourcesNotAvailableException - if the resources in the map input are not available
      IllegalResourceException - if the output contains illegal resources
      TooManyResourcesException - if the resources in pickedResources are too many for the input of the big production
      UnknownFoundException
      IllegalActionException

    • elaborateOutput

      protected void elaborateOutput​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> output) throws IllegalResourceException
      Deposit in strongbox the normal resources and convert in faith the Red resources
      Parameters:
      output - is output of a production
      Throws:
      IllegalResourceException

    • checkPickedResourcesForProduction

      protected void checkPickedResourcesForProduction​(Production p) throws ResourcesNotAvailableException, TooManyResourcesException
      check in pickedResource map if you have enough resources for activating a certain production
      Parameters:
      p - is the production
      Throws:
      ResourcesNotAvailableException - if you have picked up less resources than the needed
      TooManyResourcesException - if you have picked up more resources than the needed

    • countActivatedDiscounts

      Throws:

      TooManyResourcesException - if you have picked up more resources than the needed

      buy the selected development card and push it on the board
      Parameters:
      d - is the development card
      slot - is the id of the slots map on the board
      Throws:
      IllegalSlotException - if you can't put the card in that slot
      TooManyResourcesException
      ResourcesNotAvailableException
